title: Can THPP be compiled with CMake 2.8?
body_html:
Currently, CMake 3.0 or higher is required for THPP.
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THPP/CMakeLists.txt#L1
This is annoying for building from source on Ubuntu 14.04 systems, as default CMake is 2.8, and updating it requires either compiling from source or adding some random repos:
http://askubuntu.com/questions/610291/how-to-install-cmake-3-2-on-ubuntu-14-04

sudo apt-get install software-properties-common
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:george-edison55/cmake-3.x
sudo apt-get update

@colesbury

body:
Currently, CMake 3.0 or higher is required for THPP. 
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THPP/CMakeLists.txt#L1
This is annoying for building from source on Ubuntu 14.04 systems, as default CMake is 2.8, and updating it requires either compiling from source or adding some random repos:
http://askubuntu.com/questions/610291/how-to-install-cmake-3-2-on-ubuntu-14-04
```
sudo apt-get install software-properties-common
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:george-edison55/cmake-3.x
sudo apt-get update
```
@colesbury
